title: Introduction

",i(t.p,{children:["Chonza is a collection of components and styles that can be used to build web applications. It is designed to be simple and easy to integrate into your ",e(t.strong,{children:"ReactJS"})," and ",e(t.strong,{children:"NextJS"})," projects."]}),"

",i(t.p,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Simple"}),": Chonza is designed to be simple and easy to use. It is built on top of TailwindCSS and Framer Motion, which makes it easy to integrate into your projects."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",i(t.p,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Customizable"}),": Chonza is highly customizable. You can easily change the colors, fonts, and other styles to match your brand."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",i(t.p,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Responsive"}),": Chonza is designed to be responsive. It works on all devices, from mobile to desktop."]}),"
"]}),"

",i(t.p,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Open Source"}),": Chonza is open source. You can use it for free in your personal and commercial projects and contribute to its development."]}),"

",e(t.p,{children:"You only need to install the dependencies and import the components that you want to use in your project."}),"

"]}),"

",i(t.p,{children:["Chonza is inspired by other libraries like ",e(t.strong,{children:"ShadCN"})," and ",e(t.strong,{children:"MagicUI"})," so I want to give them credit for their work and inspiration, also I want to thank the ",e(t.strong,{children:"TailwindCSS"})," team for their amazing work."]})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:i}=n.components||{};return i?e(i,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};
